段: 一直也相信著你袂愛別人，一直也相信著情夢袂成空。是我大意心迷茫，感情放即重，心頭亂悶啦悶啦喲。敢講無可能敢講無希望，敢講攏無挽回的一工，過去的種種你敢攏無懷念，叫阮一時怎樣怎樣放？

it-tit8 ia7 siong-sin3 tioh8 li2 be7 ai3 pat8-lang5, it-tit8 ia7 siong-sin3 tioh8 cheng5-bang7 be7 chiann5 khong3. si7 goa2 toa7-i3 sim be5-bong5, kam2-cheng5 pang3 chiah tang7, sim-thau5 loan7 bun7--lah bun7--lah io. kam2 kong2 bo5 kho2-leng5 kam2 kong2 bo5 hi-bong7, kam2 kong2 long2 bo5 ban2-hoe5 e5 chit8 kang, koe3-khi3 e5 chiong2-chiong2 li2 kam2 long2 bo5 hoai5-liam7, kio3 goan2 chit8 si5 chainn2-iunn7 chainn2-iunn7 pang3?
一直也相信著你袂愛別人，一直也相信著情夢袂成空。是我大意心迷茫，感情放即重，心頭亂悶啦悶啦喲。敢講無可能敢講無希望，敢講攏無挽回的一工，過去的種種你敢攏無懷念，叫阮一時怎樣怎樣放？

it-tit8 ia7 siong-sin3 tioh8 li2 be7 ai3 pat8-lang5, it-tit8 ia7 siong-sin3 tioh8 cheng5-bang7 be7 chiann5 khong3. si7 goa2 toa7-i3 sim be5-bong5, kam2-cheng5 pang3 chiah tang7, sim-thau5 loan7 bun7--lah bun7--lah io. kam2 kong2 bo5 kho2-leng5 kam2 kong2 bo5 hi-bong7, kam2 kong2 long2 bo5 ban2-hoe5 e5 chit8 kang, koe3-khi3 e5 chiong2-chiong2 li2 kam2 long2 bo5 hoai5-liam7, kio3 goan2 chit8 si5 chainn2-iunn7 chainn2-iunn7 pang3?
一直也相信著你袂愛別人，一直也相信著情夢袂成空。是我大意心迷茫，感情放即重，心頭亂悶啦悶啦喲。

it-tit8 ia7 siong-sin3 tioh8 li2 be7 ai3 pat8-lang5, it-tit8 ia7 siong-sin3 tioh8 cheng5-bang7 be7 chiann5 khong3. si7 goa2 toa7-i3 sim be5-bong5, kam2-cheng5 pang3 chiah tang7, sim-thau5 loan7 bun7--lah bun7--lah io.
思念的滋味酸當做甜，愛你愛即幾年，一回頭攏過去，人有時想未開，天光看做是暗暝，目屎像落雪，煞一點一點飛落行過彼條路，阮是怎樣會即糊塗？

su-liam7 e5 chu-bi7 sng tong3-cho3 tinn, ai3 li2 ai3 chiah kui2 ni5, chit8 hoe5-thau5 long2 koe3-khi3, lang5 u7-si5 siunn7 be7 khui, thinn-kng khoann3-choe3 si7 am3-mi5, bak8-sai2 chhiunn7 loh8-seh, soah chit8 tiam2 chit8 tiam2 poe loh8 kiann5-koe3 hit tiau5 lou7, goan2 si7 chainn2-iunn7 e7 chiah hou5-tou5?
為何你的心會即爾冰啦，喙唇即爾甜，按怎講甲即爾虛，我偏偏相信你，真正我的感情放即多，啊！心會即爾萎啦。

ui7-ho5 li2 e5 sim e7 chiah-nih peng lah, chhui3-tun5 chiah-nih tinn, an2-choann2 kong2 kah chiah-nih hi, goa2 phian-phian siong-sin3 li2, chin-chiann3 goa2 e5 kam2-cheng5 pang3 chiah choe7, ah! sim e7 chiah-nih e--lah.
你予阮食虧，回頭看阮的心情往事，風吹未開苦戀的滋味，我無怨天。
li2 hou7 gun2 chiah8-khui, hoe5-thau5 khoann3 goan2 e5 sim-cheng5 ong2-su7, hong chhoe be7 khui khou2-loan7 e5 chu-bi7, goa2 bo5 oan3 thinn.
當初也是有意，將心肝放予你，完全是離未開，假愛當做是安慰，悲傷親像雨，煞一陣一陣拍落阮的彼場夢，夢內我猶原醉茫茫。

tong-chhou ia7 si7 iu2-i3, chiong sim-koann pang3 hou7 li2, oan5-choan5 si7 li5 be7 khui, ke2 ai3 tong3-cho3 si7 an-ui3, pi-siong chhin-chhiunn7 hou7, soah chit8 chun7 chit8 chun7 phah loh8 goan2 e5 hit tiunn5 bang7, bang7-lai7 goa2 iu5-goan5 chui3-bong5-bong5.
問一聲天地我的身世，為何漂流的命底？問一聲大海我的將來，為何充滿種種的阻礙？毋知故鄉這陣爸爸媽媽身體勇健無？毋知故鄉這陣心愛的人猶底等我無？啊！心亂啊！操煩。為何我的命是這款？

mng7 chit8 siann thinn-te7 goa2 e5 sin-se3, ui7-ho5 phiau-liu5 e5 mia7-te2? mng7 chit8 siann toa7-hai2 goa2 e5 chiong-lai5, ui7-ho5 chhiong-moa2 chiong2-chiong2 e5 chou2-gai7? m7 chai kou3-hiong chit-chun7 pa-pa ma-ma sin-the2 iong2-kiann7 bo5? m7 chai kou3-hiong chit-chun7 sim-ai3 e5 lang5 iau2 teh tan2 goa2 bo5? ah! sim loan7 ah! chhau-hoan5. ui7-ho5 goa2 e5 mia7 si7 chit khoan2?
問一聲天地我的身世，為何漂流的命底？問一聲大海我的將來，為何充滿種種的阻礙？毋知故鄉這陣爸爸媽媽身體勇健無？毋知故鄉這陣心愛的人猶底等我無？啊！心亂啊！操煩。為何我的命是這款？

mng7 chit8 siann thinn-te7 goa2 e5 sin-se3, ui7-ho5 phiau-liu5 e5 mia7-te2? mng7 chit8 siann toa7-hai2 goa2 e5 chiong-lai5, ui7-ho5 chhiong-moa2 chiong2-chiong2 e5 chou2-gai7? m7 chai kou3-hiong chit-chun7 pa-pa ma-ma sin-the2 iong2-kiann7 bo5? m7 chai kou3-hiong chit-chun7 sim-ai3 e5 lang5 iau2 teh tan2 goa2 bo5? ah! sim loan7 ah! chhau-hoan5. ui7-ho5 goa2 e5 mia7 si7 chit khoan2?
毋知故鄉這陣爸爸媽媽身體勇健無？毋知故鄉這陣心愛的人猶底等我無？啊！心亂啊！操煩。為何我的命是這款？

m7 chai kou3-hiong chit-chun7 pa-pa ma-ma sin-the2 iong2-kiann7 bo5? m7 chai kou3-hiong chit-chun7 sim-ai3 e5 lang5 iau2 teh tan2 goa2 bo5? ah! sim loan7 ah! chhau-hoan5. ui7-ho5 goa2 e5 mia7 si7 chit khoan2?
逐工攏是過著無聊的日子，生活中無淡薄仔趣味，阮也已經到了戀愛的年紀，到現在也毋知伊是啥物滋味，雖然阮的年紀猶閣無幾歲，阮嘛聽見別人有講過，現在的社會陷阱有真濟，尤其是男人的彼號白賊話，心愛，等一下，對愛情毋通太癡迷。

tak8-kang long2 si7 koe3 tioh8 bo5-liau5 e5 jit8-chi2, seng-oah8 tiong bo5 tam7-poh8-a2 chhu3-bi7, gun2 ia7 i2-keng kau3 liau2 loan5-ai3 e5 ni5-ki2, kau3 hian7-chai7 ia7 m7 chai i si7 siann2-mih8 chu-bi7, sui-jian5 goan2 e5 ni5-ki2 iau2 koh bo5 kui2 hoe3, goan2 ma7 thiann-kinn3 pat8-lang5 u7 kong2 koe3, hian7-chai7 e5 sia7-hoe7 ham7-chenn2 u7 chin che7, iu5-ki5 si7 lam5-jin5 e5 hit-ho7 peh8-chhat8-oe7, sim-ai3, tan2 chit8-e7, tui3 ai3-cheng5 m7 thang thai3 chhi-be5.
阮的青春親像水中蓮花，期待愛情陪伴阮的美麗，心愛，等一下，請恁就愛看予詳細，若欲好的對象愛慢慢也尋，千萬毋通著急，也毋免驚歹勢。

goan2 e5 chheng-chhun chhin-chhiunn7 chui2 tiong lian5-hoe, ki5-thai7 ai3-cheng5 poe5-phoann7 goan2 e5 bi2-le7, sim-ai3, tan2 chit8-e7, chhiann2 lin2 chiu7 ai3 khoann3 hou7 siong5-soe3, na7 beh ho2 e5 tui3-siong7 ai3 ban7-ban7 a2 chhoe7, chhian-ban7 m7 thang tioh8-kip, ia7 m7 bian2 kiann phainn2-si3.
手摜傷心的行李，今夜決心來離開，看著你滿面的珠淚，我的心肝強欲碎。雖然真心疼痛你，互相勉強也無意義，送你這卡無緣的手指，感謝你陪伴我即濟年。啊！心愛的甭哭，請你將我放袂記，啊！你無欠我我無欠你。

chhiu2 koann7 siong-sim e5 heng5-li2, kim-ia7 koat-sim lai5 li7-khui, khoann3 tioh8 li2 moa2-bin7 e5 chu-lui7, goa2 e5 sim-koann kiong5 beh chhui3. sui-jian5 chin-sim thiann3-thang3 li2, hou7-siong bian2-kiong2 ia7 bo5 i3-gi7, sang3 li2 chit kha bo5-ian5 e5 chhiu2-chi2, kam2-sia7 li2 poe5-phoann7 goa2 chiah che7 ni5. ah! sim-ai3 e5 mai3 khau3, chhiann2 li2 chiong goa2 pang3 be7 ki3, ah! li2 bo5 khiam3 goa2 goa2 bo5 khiam3 li2.
手摜傷心的行李，今夜決心來離開，看著你滿面的珠淚，我的心肝強欲碎。雖然真心疼痛你，互相勉強也無意義，送你這卡無緣的手指，感謝你陪伴我即濟年。啊！心愛的甭哭，請你將我放袂記，啊！你無欠我我無欠你。

chhiu2 koann7 siong-sim e5 heng5-li2, kim-ia7 koat-sim lai5 li7-khui, khoann3 tioh8 li2 moa2-bin7 e5 chu-lui7, goa2 e5 sim-koann kiong5 beh chhui3. sui-jian5 chin-sim thiann3-thang3 li2, hou7-siong bian2-kiong2 ia7 bo5 i3-gi7, sang3 li2 chit kha bo5-ian5 e5 chhiu2-chi2, kam2-sia7 li2 poe5-phoann7 goa2 chiah che7 ni5. ah! sim-ai3 e5 mai3 khau3, chhiann2 li2 chiong goa2 pang3 be7 ki3, ah! li2 bo5 khiam3 goa2 goa2 bo5 khiam3 li2.
雖然真心疼痛你，互相勉強也無意義，送你這卡無緣的手指，感謝你陪伴我即濟年。啊！心愛的甭哭，請你將我放袂記，啊！你無欠我我無欠你。

sui-jian5 chin-sim thiann3-thang3 li2, hou7-siong bian2-kiong2 ia7 bo5 i3-gi7, sang3 li2 chit kha bo5-ian5 e5 chhiu2-chi2, kam2-sia7 li2 poe5-phoann7 goa2 chiah che7 ni5. ah! sim-ai3 e5 mai3 khau3, chhiann2 li2 chiong goa2 pang3 be7 ki3, ah! li2 bo5 khiam3 goa2 goa2 bo5 khiam3 li2.
啥物愛我一世人，害我感情博即重，癡情來對你了戇工，如今才知一場空。早若會知你會來變這款，嘛袂為你心茫茫，啊！啥人袂怨嘆，心愛的心愛的人妝甲媠媠嫁別人。

siann2-mih8 ai3 goa2 chit8-si3-lang5, hai7 goa2 kam2-cheng5 poah8 chiah tang7, chhi-cheng5 lai5 tui3 li2 liau2 gong7-kong, ju5-kim chiah chai chit8 tiunn5 khang. cha2 na7 e7 chai li2 e7 lai5 pian3 chit khoan2, ma7  boe7 ui7 li2 sim bang5-bang5, ah! siann2-lang5 be7 oan3-than3, sim-ai3--e5 sim-ai3--e5 lang5 chng kah sui2-sui2 ke3 pat8-lang5.
啥物愛我一世人，害我感情博即重，癡情來對你了戇工，如今才知一場空。早若會知你會來變這款，嘛袂為你心茫茫，啊！啥人袂怨嘆，心愛的心愛的人妝甲媠媠嫁別人。

siann2-mih8 ai3 goa2 chit8-si3-lang5, hai7 goa2 kam2-cheng5 poah8 chiah tang7, chhi-cheng5 lai5 tui3 li2 liau2 gong7-kong, ju5-kim chiah chai chit8 tiunn5 khang. cha2 na7 e7 chai li2 e7 lai5 pian3 chit khoan2, ma7  boe7 ui7 li2 sim bang5-bang5, ah! siann2-lang5 be7 oan3-than3, sim-ai3--e5 sim-ai3--e5 lang5 chng kah sui2-sui2 ke3 pat8-lang5.
早若會知你會來變這款，嘛袂為你心茫茫，啊！啥人袂怨嘆，心愛的心愛的人妝甲媠媠嫁別人。
cha2 na7 e7 chai li2 e7 lai5 pian3 chit khoan2, ma7  boe7 ui7 li2 sim bang5-bang5, ah! siann2-lang5 be7 oan3-than3, sim-ai3--e5 sim-ai3--e5 lang5 chng kah sui2-sui2 ke3 pat8-lang5.
恁永遠攏毋知影佇我心內的感覺，堅強外表以外藏著溫柔，毋敢講，毋敢聽，驚別人知影阮心情，將寂寞攏寫踮這首歌。

lin2 eng2-oan2 long2 m7 chai-iann2 ti7 goa2 sim-lai7 e5 kam2-kak, kian-kiong5 goa7-piau2 i2-goa7 chhang3 tioh8 un-jiu5, m7 kann2 kong2, m7 kann2 thiann, kiann pat8-lang5 chai-iann2 goan2 sim-chiann5, chiong chek8-bok8 long2 sia2 tiam3 chit siu2 koa.
我除了愛情以外，一切攏會當看破，只是袂當了解，感情若緣份來，緣份散，我永遠踮佇緣份外。
goa2 tu5-liau2 ai3-cheng5 i2-goa7, it-chhe3 long2 e7 tang3 khoann3-phoa3, chi2-si7 be7 tang3 liau2-kai2, kam2-cheng5 na7 ian5-hun7 lai5, ian5-hun7 soann3, goa2 eng2-oan2 tiam3 ti7 ian5-hun7 goa7.
恁的心攏尋無阮的，為何心愛的人毋是我，將我的心當做是冰山，對我是普通的，為何心愛的人毋是我，永遠心疼別人的心肝，愛情的故事。

lin2 e5 sim long2 chhoe7 bo5 goan2 e5, ui7-ho5 sim-ai3 e5 lang5 m7 si7 goa2, chiong goa2 e5 sim tong3-cho3 si7 peng-soann, tui3 goa2 si7 phou2-thong e5, ui7-ho5 sim-ai3 e5 lang5 m7 si7 goa2, eng2-oan2 sim-thiann3 pat8-lang5 e5 sim-koann, ai3-cheng5 e5 kou3-su7.
想伊想甲黃昏，愈想愈愛愈恨，一夜無聲無講無睏。
siunn7 i siunn7 kah hong5-hun, lu2 siunn7 lu2 ai3 ju2 hun7, chit8 ia7 bo5 siann bo5 kong2 bo5 khun3.
心事一陣一陣，胭脂抹著雙唇，啊是阮等待的青春。戀夢亂亂紛紛，愈想愈無分寸，一夜無風無月無雲。

sim-su7 chit8-chun7 chit8-chun7, ian-chi boah tioh8 siang-tun5, ah si7 goan2 tan2-thai7 e5 chheng-chhun. loan5-bang7 loan7-loan7-hun-hun, lu2 siunn7 lu2 bo5 hun-chhun3, chit8 ia7 bo5 hong bo5 goeh8 bo5 hun5.
大雨一陣一陣，相思滴落眠床，又一點一滴到黃昏，陣陣滴答滴答滴雨聲那通笑阮。
toa7-hou7 chit8-chun7 chit8-chun7, siunn-si tih loh8 bin5-chhng5, iu7 chit8 tiam2 chit8 tih kau3 hong5-hun, tin7-tin7 tih-tah8 tih-tap tih hou7-siann na2 thang chhio3 goan2.
尋無伊陪阮搭同船，啊！害阮等伊等甲這陣，規暝無睏，心愛的人實在可恨。
chhoe7 bo5 i poe5 goan2 tah tang5-chun5, ah! hai7 goan2 tan2 i tan2 kah chit chun7, kui-me5 bo5 khun3, sim-ai3 e5 lang5 sit8-chai7 kho2-hun7.
思念是窗邊的花蕊，風風雨雨才離枝。身邊冷清清才來想起，彼時甜蜜的春天。啊！愛情的酒醉規暝，心情是懵懂的火車，毋知欲往佗位去。想起彼當時你有講起，閣較艱苦毋願離，啊！心愛的你。

su-liam7 si7 thang-pinn e5 hoe-lui2, hong-hong-u2-u2 chiah li7 ki. sin-pinn leng2-chheng-chheng chiah lai5 siunn7-khi2, hit-si5 tinn-bit8 e5 chhun-thinn. ah! ai3-cheng5 e5 chiu2-chui3 kui-me5, sim-cheng5 si7 bang2-tong2 e5 hoe2-chhia, m7 chai beh ong2 tah-ui7 khi3. siunn7-khi2 hit tong-si5 li2 u7 kong2-khi2, koh khah kan-khou2 m7 goan7 li7, ah! sim-ai3 e5 li2.
真心來做伴，有你的日子，心內未孤單。無論到佗位，心內攏有你，毋驚無依倚。苦苦相思因為愛你，心事紛紛因為掛心，若是為你甘願心碎心碎，心愛的你我猶原癡心底等待，等你轉來阮身邊。傷心的往事放予袂記，一生一世毋願離，啊！心愛的你。

chin-sim lai5 cho3-phoann7, u7 li2 e5 jit8-chi2, sim-lai7 be7 kou-toann. bo5-lun7 kau3 tah-ui7, sim-lai7 long2 u7 li2, m7 kiann bo5 i-oa2. khou2-khou2 siunn-si in-ui7 ai3 li2, sim-su7 hun-hun in-ui7 khoa3-sim, na7 si7 ui7 li2 kam-goan7 sim chhui3 sim chhui3, sim-ai3--e5 li2 goa2 iu5-goan5 chhi-sim teh tan2-thai7, tan2 li2 tng2 lai5 goan2 sin-pinn. siong-sim e5 ong2-su7 pang3 hou7 boe7 ki3, it-seng it-se3 m7 goan7 li7, ah! sim-ai3 e5 li2.
心愛的毋通驚，心愛的毋免哮，雖然外面風雨即爾大，咱的情份已經到最後，運命的無情也看透。
sim-ai3--e5 m7 thang kiann, sim-ai3--e5 m7 bian2 hau2, sui-jian5 goa7-bin7 hong-hou7 chiah-nih toa7, lan2 e5 cheng5-hun7 i2-keng kau3 choe3-au7, un7-mia7 e5 bo5-cheng5 ia7 khoann3 thau3.
聲聲句句你莫走，猶原也是袂當將你留，怨嘆命運怨恨天已經無效，多情的雨你敢是為咱雙人佇底哮，同情你咱的愛，袂當到老。

siann-siann ku3-ku3 li2 mai3 chau2, iu5-goan5 ia7 si7 boe7 tang chiong3 li2 lau5, oan3-than3 mia7-un7 oan3-hun7 thinn i2-keng bo5-hau7, to-cheng5 e5 hou7 li2 kann2 si7 ui7 lan2 siang-lang5 ti7 teh hau2, tong5-cheng5 li2 lan2 e5 ai3, be7 tang3 kau3 lau7.
